sourcesContent:
import React, { createContext, useReducer } from 'react';


const initialState = {
    nav: {
        bg: '#EAF4FC', // Light blue for the background
        logoContainer: '#3A7CA5', // Deep ocean blue for the logo container
        h1: '#1F4E78', // Rich navy blue for text
        hamburger: '#A8D0E6', // Soft sky blue for the hamburger menu
        hamDiv: '#D9EFFC', // Almost white with a blue tint for the divider
        links: '#2B6E99', // Muted blue for link text
        linksPhone: '#3A7CA5',
        linkLi: '#A8D0E6',
        linkA: '#1F4E78',
        iconContainer: '#3A7CA5',
        iconA: '#A8D0E6',
        profile: '#1F4E78',
        pulse: '#A8D0E6',
        cart: '#3A7CA5',
    },
    landing: {
        bg: '#EAF4FC', // Neutral light blue for the background
        left: '#A8D0E6', // Light sky blue for the left section
        textLeft: '#1F4E78', // Rich navy blue for the text
        textLeftSpan: '#3A7CA5', // Highlighted text in deep blue
        center: '#FFFFFF', // White for the central area to create focus
        shopLink: '#3A7CA5', // Blue for the shop link
        centerButtons: '#2B6E99', // Muted blue for buttons
        centerButtonsLink: '#FFFFFF', // White text on buttons
        centerButton2: '#1F4E78', // Navy blue for secondary buttons
        centerButton2Link: '#FFFFFF',
        storeButton: '#3A7CA5', // Deep blue for the store button
        aboutButton: '#2B6E99', // Muted blue for the about button
        right: '#C9E3F9', // Soft gradient blue for the right section
        textRight: '#1F4E78', // Rich navy blue for the text
        textRightSpan: '#3A7CA5', // Highlighted text in deep blue
    },
    offeringSchema: {
        bg: 'rgba(234, 244, 252, 0.9)', // Transparent blue for the background
        bgHover: 'rgba(234, 244, 252, 1)',
        icon: '#3A7CA5',
        iconHover: '#A8D0E6',
        title: '#1F4E78',
        description: '#2B6E99',
        styledLink: '#A8D0E6',
        styledLinkHover: '#3A7CA5',
    },
    offering: {
        bg: 'rgba(234, 244, 252, 0.8)',
        introduction: 'rgba(234, 244, 252, 0.7)',
        introH1: '#1F4E78',
        introH2: '#3A7CA5',
        introP: '#5B8AB1', // Muted blue for paragraph text
        offers: 'rgba(201, 227, 249, 0.03)', // Subtle background for offers
    },
    contact: {
        bg: '#EAF4FC',
        title: '#1F4E78',
        description: '#2B6E99',
        socialLinks: '#A8D0E6',
        socialLink: '#3A7CA5',
    },
    clientCounter: {
        bg: 'rgba(234, 244, 252, 0.9)',
        countWrapper: 'rgba(234, 244, 252, 0.8)',
        number: '#3A7CA5',
        counter: '#A8D0E6',
    },
    about: {
        bg: '#EAF4FC',
        aboutSection: '#C9E3F9',
        aboutSectionH1: '#1F4E78',
        aboutSectionH2: '#3A7CA5',
        aboutSectionP: '#5B8AB1',
        faq: '#A8D0E6',
        dropdown: '#3A7CA5',
        dropdownH1: '#1F4E78',
        answer: '#C9E3F9',
        answerP: '#2B6E99',
    },
    footer: {
        bg: '#EAF4FC',
        footWrapper: '#EAF4FC',
        section: '#1F4E78',
        companyTitile: '#3A7CA5',
        companyDescription: '#5B8AB1',
        sectionTitile: '#2B6E99',
        styledLink: '#A8D0E6',
        finalSection: '#C9E3F9',
        finalText: '#1F4E78',
        finalLink: '#3A7CA5',
    },
    register: {
        bg: '#F4F7FB', // Soft light blue-gray background for a calm, welcoming vibe
        left: '#FFFFFF', // White for the left container to keep it clean and crisp
        c1: '#333', // Light steel blue for the first circle for a subtle effect
        c2: '#A2B9D4', // Light slate gray-blue for the second circle for depth
        c3: '#7F9B9B', // Muted teal for the third circle to add contrast without being overpowering
        c4: '#333', // Very light gray-blue for the fourth circle for extra depth
        welcome: '#2C3E50', // Darker navy blue for the welcome message, strong and welcoming
        description: '#34495E', // Slightly lighter grayish navy for the description text, softer than the welcome
        linktext: '#1ABC9C', // Fresh teal for links to draw attention without being too aggressive
        styledLink: '#3498DB', // Bright, medium blue for the styled links to match the overall theme
        right: '#ECF0F1', // Very light gray-blue for the right section, complements the light theme
        container: '#FFFFFF', // White for the container to keep things clean and focused
        heading: '#2980B9', // Strong blue for the heading to make it stand out
        input: '#BDC3C7',
        inputBorder: '',
        inputTextColor: '',
        inputShadow: '',
        inpurBorderHover: '',
        inputHover: '',
        registerBtn: '#3498DB', // A brighter blue for the register button to give it importance
        responseMsg: '#27AE60', // Success messages in a fresh green to indicate success
    }
    
};


const reducer = (state, action) => {
    switch (action.type) {

        default:
            return state
    }
}

export const colorContext = createContext();
const ColorContextProvider = ({ children }) => {

    const [config, dispatchConfig] = useReducer(reducer, initialState)

    return (
        <colorContext.Provider value={{ config, dispatchConfig }}>
            {children}
        </colorContext.Provider>
    );
};

export default ColorContextProvider;
